section.title:
tax classes
creating new Tax Class
section.para: To create a new Tax Class, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Tax Class, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a code to identify the Tax Class.
Enter a description to describe the Tax Class.
Select or enter a Group Sequence for this Tax Class. The Group Sequence is used for calculating cumulative taxes.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Tax Class, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Tax Class and adds it to the master list of Tax Classes.
